amendment.description: To modernize Government information technology, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1006 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1006 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5793) To modernize Government information technology, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1006 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1006 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 1003.
